name: 技術動態分析
description: Technology dynamics is broad and relatively new scientific field that has been developed in the framework of the postwar science and technology studies field. The analysis of technology dynamics attempts to predict the future characteristics and development trends of technology from the aspects of both internal factors as well as external factors. The capabilities are essentials for Ph.D. students in analyzing dynamic behaviors of a technology and the systemic relationships between the technology and other technologies as well we social changes. Thus, this course intends to introduce modern theories being related to technology dynamics as well as methods and analytic frameworks practices to the Ph.D.  students. Major emphasis of this course will be placed on theory introductions and forecasting techniques manipulations. Students are expected to solve academic research problems by using the theories and methods being introduced in this course.
goals: 協助學生瞭解並應用技術動態分析理論
